titleStmt.title: England faithfully watcht with, in her wounds: or, Christ as a father sitting up with his children in their swooning state: which is the summe of severall lecvtures painfully preached upon Colossians 1. / By Nicho. Lockyer, M.A. Published according to order.
titleStmt.author: Lockyer, Nicholas, 1611-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.S. for John Rothwell, at the Sun and Fountain in Pauls Church-yard, and Ben. Allen, at the Crown in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "feb: 1645"; the second 6 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
